issue.title: [CI] Travis-CI should not run on unrelated changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17926](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17926). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Travis-CI currently runs jobs for C++, Python and Java, but as we can see in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14304, it gets run anyway for changes that don't touch those areas at all.
